Translations.Text: ni:Sanka imanavala'o'e saphalata prapta kari lidhi
je'o potani namajhone khusu'a (ekagrata) sathe padhe che
je'o bakavasa vatothi modhum pheravi de che
je'o jhakata apanara che
Je'o potana guptangani suraksa karavavala che
potani patni'o tatha potani maliki hethalani dasi'o sivaya, kharekhara a banne nindane patra nathi
je'o a sivaya bijum icche che te ja hada vatavi denara che
je'o potani amanato ane vacanonum palana karanara che
je'o potani namajhoni dekharekha rakhe che
a ja loko varasadara che
je'o phiradausa (jannatamam ucca sthananum nama) na varasadara hase, jyam te'o hammesa rahese
ni:Sanka ame manusyanum sarjana matina kana vade karyum
pachi tene tipum banavi, suraksita jagya'e muki didhum

pachi tipane ame jamelum lohi banavi didhum. Pachi te jamela lohine mansano tukado banavi didho, pachi mansana tukadane hadaka banavi didha, pachi hadaka'o para ame mansa cadhavi didhum, pachi biji banavatamam tenum sarjana karyum. Barakatovalo che te allaha, je srestha sarjana karanara che
tyara pachi tame sau kharekhara mrtyu pamaso
pachi, ni:Sanka kayamatana divase tamane saune uthadavamam avase
ame tamara upara sata akaso banavya ane ame sarjanathi bedarakara nathi
ame eka pramana mujaba akasa manthi pani varasavi'e chi'e, pachi tene dharatimam roki la'i'e chi'e ane ame tene la'i java para kharekhara sakti dharavi'e chi'e
te ja pani vade ame tamara mate khajuro ane draksana bagica'o upajavi'e chi'e, jethi tamara mate temam ghana prakarana phalo hoya che, temanthi ja tame kha'o pana cho
ane te vrksa, je ture saina parvata parathi nikale che, je tela visarjita kare che ane khavavala'o mate supa che
tamara mate dhoromam pana ghani sikhamana che, temana peta manthi ame tamane dudha pivadavi'e chi'e ane bija ghana phayada'o tamara mate temam che, temanthi ketalanka ne tame kha'o pana cho
Ane temana para ane hodi'omam savari karo cho

ni:Sanka ame nuha a.Sa.Ne temani koma tarapha payagambara banavi avatarita karya. Temane kahyum ke he mari komana loko! Allahani bandagi karo ane tena sivaya tamaro ko'i pujya nathi, sum tame (tenathi) darata nathi

temani komana inkara karanara agevano'e spasta kahi didhum ke a to tamara jevo ja manusya che, ato tamara para hoddo icche che, jo allahani a iccha hota to ko'i pharistane avatarita karato. Ame to a vise amara purvajona samayamam sambhalyu ja nathi
ni:Sanka a vyakti pagala che, basa! Tame tene eka samaya sudhi mahetala apo
nuha a.Sa.E du'a kari, he mara palanahara! A lokona juthalavava para tum mari madada kara

to ame temani tarapha vahi avatarita kari ke tame amari ankho samaksa amari vahi pramane eka hodi banavo, jyare amaro adesa avi jaya ane tannura ubhara'i jaya, to tame dareka prakarani eka'eka joda temam muki do ane potana gharavala'one pana, parantu te loko sivaya, jemana vise amari vata pahela tha'i ga'i che, khabaradara je loko'e atyacara karyo che temana vise mari sathe kami vatacita na karata. Te saune dubadavamam avase
jyare tame ane tamara mitro hodimam santithi besi java to kahejo ke dareka prakarani prasansa allaha mate ja che, jene amane atyacari lokothi chutakaro apyo
ane kahejo ke he mara palanahara! Mane barakatani sathe utara, ane tum ja utarava mate srestha che
kharekhara amam moti moti nisani'o che ane ame ni:Sanka kasoti karavavala che
tyara pachi ame ghani kaumonum sarjana karyum
pachi te loko manthi payagambara pana mokalya, jethi tame sau allahani bandagi karo, tena sivaya tamaro ko'i pujya nathi, tame kema darata nathi

Ane komana saradaro'e javaba apyo, je'o inkara karata hatam ane akheratani mulakatane juthalavata hatam ane ame te lokone duniyana jivanamam samrd'dha banavya hatam, (te'o'e kahyum) ke a to tamara jevo ja manusya che. Tamara jevo ja khoraka a pana khaya che ane tamara piva matena panine pana te'o pive che
jo tame potana jeva ja manavinum anusarana karava lagya, to ni:Sanka tame khuba nukasana uthavanara banaso
sum te tamane a vatanum vacana ape che ke jyare tame mrtyu pami phakta mati ane hadaka rahi jaso, to tame pacha jivita karavamam avaso
nahim, nahim dura ane ghanum ja dura che te, jenum tamane vacana apavamam ave che
(jivana) to phakta duniyanum jivana che, apane mrtyu pami'e chi'e ane jivita tha'i'e chi'e. Ane evum nathi ke apane pacha jivita karavamam avisum
a to basa! Evo vyakti che, jene allaha para juthanum bandhyum, ame to a vyakti para imana lavavana nathi
payagambare du'a kari ke palanahara! A lokona juthalavava para tum mari madada kara
javaba apyo ke a loko to najika manja potana karmo para dilagiri vyakta karase
chevate n'yaya pramane cise (daramana avaje) temane pakadi lidha ane ame te lokone asta-vyasta kari nakhya, basa! Atyacari'o mate duri che
tyara pachi ame biji ghani komonum sarjana karyum
na to ko'i koma potana samayathi agala vadhi ane na to pachala rahi ga'i

pachi ame eka-pachi eka payagambarone avatarita karata rahya, jyare pana je koma pase temana payagambara avya, temane juthalavya, basa! Ame ekane bija pachala lagavi didha ane te lokone navalakatha banavi didha. Te loko mate duri che, je'o imana nathi lavata
Pachi ame musa a.Sa. Ane temana bha'i haruna a.Sa.Ne potani ayato ane spasta purava sathe avatarita karya
phira'auna ane tena laskaro tarapha, basa! Te loko'e ghamanda karyum ane te loko vidrohi ja hatam
kaheva lagya ke sum ame apana jeva be vyakti'o para imana lavi'e? Jo ke temani koma pote (pana) amari dekharekha hethala che
basa! Te loko'e te bannene juthalavya, chevate te loko pana nasta thayela'o manthi tha'i gaya
ame musa a.Sa.Ne kitaba pana api, jethi loko satya marga para avi jaya
ame marayamana dikara ane teni matane eka nisani banavya ane te bannene ucca, svaccha ane raheva layaka, ane vaheta panivali jagya para sarana apyum
he payagambaro! Halala vastu kha'o ane satkarya karo, tame je kami pana kari rahya cho tene hum sari rite janum chum
ni:Sanka a tamaro dina eka ja dina che ane hum ja tamara sauno palanahara chum, basa! Tame marathi darata raho
pachi te loko'e pote (ja) potana adesa (dina)na andaro'andara tukade tukada kari didha, dareka jutha je kami temani pase che, tena para ja itara'i rahyo che
basa! Tame (pana) temane vidroha mate thodoka samaya api do
sum a loko ema samaji betha che ke ame je kami pana temanum dhana ane santanamam vadharo kari rahya che, (te temane phayado pahoncadase)
te'o potana mate bhala'i'omam utavala kari rahya che, (nahim) parantu a loko samajata ja nathi
ni:Sanka je loko potana palanaharana gus'sathi dare che
ane je potana palanaharani ayato para imana dharave che
ane je loko potana palanahara sathe ko'ine bhagidara nathi banavata
ane je loko ape che ane je kami pana ape che ane te lokona hrdaya kampe che ke te'o potana palanahara tarapha pacha pharavana che
A ja te loko che, je'o jhadapathi phayado prapta kari rahya che ane a ja te loko che, je teni tarapha dode che
ame ko'i jivane teni takata karata vadhare takalipha nathi apata ane mari pase evi kitaba che je satya vata kare che, temana para saheja pana atyacara karavamam nahim ave
parantu temana hrdaya a vise bedarakara che ane temana mate a sivaya pana ghana karyo che, jemane te'o karavavala che
tyam sudhi ke ame temana sukhi lokone yatanamam pakadi lidha, to te bhagadoda karava lagya
aje na bhago, kharekhara amari virud'dha tamari madada karavamam nahim ave
mari ayato to tamari samaksa padhavamam avati hati, to pana tame potani edi para undha bhagata hatam
ghammada karata, navalakatha kaheta, tene chodi deta hatam
sum te loko'e e vata vise na vicaryum? Parantu temani pase te vastu avi, je temana purvajo pase nahati avi
athava, te loko'e potana payagambarane na olakhya, ke tena inkara karanara bani betha che
athava a loko kahe che ke pagala che? Parantu te to temana mate satya lavya che, ham! Temana manthi vadhare padata loko satya vatathi cidaya che

jo satya ja temani maneccha'one adhina tha'i jaya, to dharati ane akasa ane teni vacceni dareka vastu asta-vyasta tha'i jaya, satya to e che ke ame temane temana mate sikhamana pahoncadi didhi, parantu te'o potani sikhamana thi modhum pheravanara che
sum tame temani pasethi ko'i mahenatanum iccho cho? Yada rakho ke tamara palanaharanum mahenatanum ghanum ja uttama che ane te badha karata uttama roji apanara che
ni:Sanka tame to temane satya marga tarapha bolavo cho
ni:Sanka je loko akherata para imana nathi dharavata te satya margathi hati janara che
Ane jo ame temana para daya kari'e ane temani takaliphone dura kari da'i'e, to a loko to potana vidrohamam adaga rahi vadhare pathabhrasta thava lagya
ane ame te lokoni pakada yatana dvara kari, to pana a loko potana palanahara same na jhukya ane na to ajiji kari
tyam sudhi ke jyare ame te loko mate sakhata yatanano dvara kholi nakhyo, to te ja samaye tarata ja nirasa tha'i gaya
te allaha che, jene tamara mate kana ane ankho ane hrdaya banavya, parantu tame ghano ocho abhara mano cho
ane te (allaha) ja che, jene tamarum sarjana kari dharati para phelavi didha ane teni ja tarapha tame bhega karavamam avaso
ane a te ja che, je jivita kare che ane mrtyu ape che. Ane rata- divasani pherabadalino vyavasthapaka te ja che, sum tame samajata nathi
parantu te loko'e pana avi ja vata kari, je pahelana loko kaheta avya che
ke sum jyare ame mrtyu pami mati ane hadaka tha'i ja'isum, sum to pana amane uthavavamam avase
amane ane amara purvajone pahelathi ja a vacana apavamam avi rahyum che, kami nahim, a to agalana lokoni varta'o che
pucho to khara ke dharati ane teni badhi vastu'o koni che? Janavo jo janata hoya to
tarata ja javaba apase ke “allaha”. Kahi do ke pachi tame sikhamana kema prapta nathi karata
pucho to khara ke sata akaso ane ghana ja ucca, pratisthita arsano malika kona che
te loko javaba apase ke “allaha” ja che, kahi do ke pachi tame kema nathi darata
savala karo ke dareka vastuno adhikara kona hathamam che? Je sarana ape che ane jeni virud'dha ko'i sarana apanara nathi. Jo tame janata hoya to janavo
a ja javaba apase ke “allaha” ja che, kahi do ke pachi tamara para kyanthi jadu kari devamam ave che
Satyato e che ke ame temani samaksa satya vata pahoncadi didhi ane a loko kharekhara jutha che

na to allaha'e ko'ine dikaro banavyo ane na to teni sathe ko'i pujya che, nahito dareka pujya potana sarjanane la'ine pharato ane dareka ekabija para cadhi besata, je guno a loko janavi rahya che, tenathi allaha pavitra che
te hajara ane adrsya bannene jane che ane je sirka a loko kari rahya che, tenathi te pavitra che
tame du'a karo, he mara palanahara! Tum mane te janava, jenum vacana te lokone karavamam avi rahyum che
he mara palanahara! Tum mane te atyacari'ona juthamam na karisa
ame je kami vacana temane api rahya chi'e, te badhum ja tamane batavi deva kharekhara saksama chi'e
duskarmane te rite dura karo, je kharekhara srestha rita hoya, je kami a loko vato kari rahya che, tene ame sari rite jani'e chi'e
ane du'a karo ke, he mara palanahara! Hum setanana vasavasathi tarum sarana icchum chum
ane he palanahara! Hum tara saranamam avum chum ke te (setana) mari pase avi jaya
tyam sudhi ke jyare temana manthi ko'inum mrtyu avi pahonce che, to kahe che he mara palanahara! Mane pacho (duniyamam) mokali de

ke potani chodeli duniyamam ja'i satkaryo kari la'um, avum kyareya nahim thaya a to phakta eka vata che, je a loko kahi rahya che, temani pachala to eka padado che, temana biji vakhata jivita thava sudhi
basa! Jyare sura phunki devamam avase, te divase na to sambandho rahese, na eka-bijani vatacita
jemana trajavanum paladum bhare hase, te saphala thanara hase
Ane je lokona trajavanum paladum halakum tha'i gayum, a te loko che, jemane potanum nukasana pote ja kari lidhum. Je hammesa mate jahannamavala thaya
temana modha'o para aga salagati rahese ane tyam temana cahera kharaba tha'i jase
sum mari ayato tamari samaksa padhavamam nahati avati? To pana tame tene juthalavata hatam
kahese ke he palanahara! Amari kharabi amara para chava'i ga'i, (kharekhara) ame pathabhrasta ja hatam
he amara palanahara! Amane ahinyathi chutakaro apa, jo haju pana ame avum ja kari'e to, ni:Sanka ame atyacari che
allaha ta'ala kahese ke dhrtkarela ahinya ja padya raho ane mari sathe vata na karo

mara banda'onum eka jutha hatum, je satata evum kaheta rahya ke he amara palanahara! Ame imana lavi cukya, tum amane mapha kari de. Ane amara para daya kara, tum dareka dayavana lokothi sauthi vadhu dayalu che
(parantu) tame teni maskari ja karata rahya, tyam sudhi ke tame mane bhuli gaya ane tame teni sathe maskari ja karata rahya
mem aje temane temani dhirajano badalo api didho che ke te'o chevate saphala tha'i gaya
allaha ta'ala puchase ke tame dharati para varsani ganatari pramane ketlum rahya
te'o kahese ke eka divasa athava eka divasa karata pana ochum, ganatari karanara'one pana puchi lo
allaha ta'ala kahese ke kharekhara tame tyam ghanum ja ochum rahya cho, he kasa! Tame ane pahelathi ja jani leta
sum tame evum mano cho ke ame tamarum sarjana amasta ja karyum che. Ane e ke tame amari tarapha pacha pheravavamam ja nahim avo
allaha ta'ala saco badasaha che, te ghano ja ucca che, tena sivaya ko'i pujya nathi, te ja pratisthita, arsano malika che
Je vyakti allaha sathe ko'i bija pujyane pokare, jeno ko'i puravo temani pase nathi, basa! Teno hisaba to tena palanahara pase ja che, ni:Sanka inkara karanara'one chutakaro nahim male
ane kahi do ke he mara palanahara! Tum mane mapha kari de ane mara para daya kara ane tum sau dayavana karata vadhu dayalu che
